name: Grammarly
description: Grammarly integration for writing quality assessment, AI detection, plagiarism checking, and analytics. Includes Writing Score API, Analytics API, AI Detection API, and Plagiarism Detection API.

client_id.label: Client ID
client_id.help_text: Your Grammarly OAuth2 Client ID from the developer portal

client_secret.label: Client Secret
client_secret.help_text: Your Grammarly OAuth2 Client Secret. Keep this secure and never share it publicly.

analyze_writing_score.description: Submit a document for writing quality analysis. Returns a score request ID to retrieve results later. Supports .doc, .docx, .odt, .txt, .rtf formats. Maximum 4MB, minimum 30 words.

filename.description: Name of the file to be analyzed (e.g., 'document.txt', 'article.docx')

file_content.description: The text content of the file to analyze

score_request_id.description: Unique identifier to retrieve the analysis results

error.description: Error message if the action failed

get_writing_score_results.description: Retrieve the writing quality score results for a previously submitted document. Returns overall score and category scores (Engagement, Correctness, Delivery, Clarity). Results available for 30 days.

score_request_id.description: The score request ID from create_writing_score_request

status.description: Status of the scoring request: PENDING, COMPLETED, or FAILED

general_score.description: Overall writing quality score (null if status is PENDING or FAILED)

engagement.description: Engagement score (null if status is PENDING or FAILED)

correctness.description: Correctness score (null if status is PENDING or FAILED)

delivery.description: Delivery score (null if status is PENDING or FAILED)

clarity.description: Clarity score (null if status is PENDING or FAILED)

error.description: Error message if the action failed

get_user_analytics.description: Retrieve paginated list of users with Grammarly usage statistics for a date range. Includes active days, sessions, improvements, and AI prompt usage. Data available for past 365 days with 2-day lag.

date_from.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format (must be within 365 days prior)

date_to.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format (latest allowed is two days before current date)

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for fetching next page of results

data.description: List of users with analytics data

days_active.description: Number of days the user actively used Grammarly

prompt_count.description: Number of generative AI prompts used

next_cursor.description: Cursor for next page of results

page_size.description: Number of items in current page

error.description: Error message if the action failed

analyze_ai_detection.description: Submit a document for AI content detection analysis. Returns a score request ID to retrieve results later. Evaluates likelihood text was generated by AI. Maximum file size: 4MB.

filename.description: Name of the file to be analyzed (e.g., 'document.txt', 'article.docx')

file_content.description: The text content of the file to analyze

score_request_id.description: Unique identifier to retrieve the analysis results

error.description: Error message if the action failed

get_ai_detection_results.description: Retrieve AI detection results for a previously submitted document. Returns confidence score and percentage of text that appears AI-generated. Results available for 30 days.

score_request_id.description: The score request ID from create_ai_detection_request

status.description: Status of the detection request: PENDING, COMPLETED, or FAILED

average_confidence.description: Confidence level of the AI detection (0-1 scale, null if status is PENDING or FAILED)

ai_generated_percentage.description: Percentage of text that appears to be AI-generated (0-100, null if status is PENDING or FAILED)

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the result was last updated

error.description: Error message if the action failed

analyze_plagiarism_detection.description: Submit a document for plagiarism detection analysis. Returns a score request ID to retrieve results later. Compares text against billions of web pages and academic papers. Maximum file size: 4MB.

filename.description: Name of the file to be checked (e.g., 'document.txt', 'paper.docx')

file_content.description: The text content of the file to analyze

score_request_id.description: Unique identifier to retrieve the analysis results

error.description: Error message if the action failed

get_plagiarism_detection_results.description: Retrieve plagiarism detection results for a previously submitted document. Returns originality score (higher is more original) and matching sources. Results available for 30 days.

score_request_id.description: The score request ID from create_plagiarism_detection_request

status.description: Status of the detection request: PENDING, COMPLETED, or FAILED

originality_score.description: Originality score (higher means more original, null if status is PENDING or FAILED)

plagiarism_percentage.description: Percentage of text that appears to be plagiarized (0-100, null if status is PENDING or FAILED)

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the result was last updated

error.description: Error message if the action failed
